heading: Moroni kyerɛw wɔ Lamanfo hɔn yieyɛ ntsi—Nephifo a wɔammpen dɛ wɔbɔpow Christ no woku hɔn. Christ n’Awoo ekyir bɛyɛ mfe 401–421.

verses.txt: Afei emi, Moroni, aber a motwitwaa Jared no nkorɔfo hɔn abakɔsɛm no do ntsiatsia wiei no, mammpɛ dɛ nkyɛ mekyerɛw pii kã ho na mbom meda ho ara mennherae; na mannda moho edzi annkyerɛ Lamanfo no, osiandɛ bɛyɛ na wɔasɛɛ me.
Na hwɛ, akõ a woridzi no wɔ hɔn mu no yɛ dzen dodow; na osian hɔn tan ntsi wokum Nephinyi biara a ɔammpen dɛ ɔbɔpow Christ no.
Na emi, Moroni, morommpow Christ no; dɛm ntsi, mikyinkyin mbea a mubotum wɔ mo nkwa ho ntsi.

Dɛm ntsi, merekyerɛw nsɛm kakraabi bio a, otsia me nsusui nkyɛ mennsusu dɛ mebɛkyerɛw bio akã ho; naaso merekyerɛw kakra so bio akã ho, osiandɛ bɛyɛ na ɔayɛ mfaso ama m’enuanom, Lamanfo no daakye bi dɛ mbrɛ Ewuradze ne pɛ tse.
